name: Insect Planet (ElenaroArmero)
description:
This is my 3D First-Person_Shooter  project.

I made the following changes:

  1. Created three different levels. I tried to make them an increasing level of complexity.  At the same time, I slightly reworked the lighting in the game.
  2. The first level includes full tutorial.
  3. Made a new main menu, as well as in-game menus.
  4. Changed the music in the game and some sounds.
  5. Reworked UI elements a bit. For example, the boss's health bar only appears when entering the arena.
  6. Added some destructible objects.

Credits:

Created by Elenaro Armero.
